fruitful-in-affliction.hebrew: וְאֵת שֵׁם הַשֵּׁנִי קָרָא אֶפְרָיִם כִּי־הִפְרַנִי אֱלֹהִים בְּאֶרֶץ עָנְיִי
fruitful-in-affliction.english: The second he named Ephraim: 'For God has made me fruitful in the land of my affliction'

right-hand-blessing.context: Jacob places his right hand on Ephraim
right-hand-blessing.hebrew: וַיִּשְׁלַח יִשְׂרָאֵל אֶת־יְמִינוֹ וַיָּשֶׁת עַל־רֹאשׁ אֶפְרַיִם וְהוּא הַצָּעִיר
right-hand-blessing.english: Israel stretched out his right hand and laid it on Ephraim's head, though he was the younger

younger-shall-be-greater.hebrew: וְאוּלָם אָחִיו הַקָּטֹן יִגְדַּל מִמֶּנּוּ וְזַרְעוֹ יִהְיֶה מְלֹא־הַגּוֹיִם
younger-shall-be-greater.english: But truly his younger brother shall be greater than he, and his offspring shall become a multitude of nations

blessing-of-israel.hebrew: בְּךָ יְבָרֵךְ יִשְׂרָאֵל לֵאמֹר יְשִׂמְךָ אֱלֹהִים כְּאֶפְרַיִם וְכִמְנַשֶּׁה
blessing-of-israel.english: By you Israel will pronounce blessings, saying: 'God make you like Ephraim and Manasseh'

ephraim-before-manasseh.english: Thus he set Ephraim before Manasseh

ephraim-my-firstborn.hebrew: כִּי־הָיִיתִי לְיִשְׂרָאֵל לְאָב וְאֶפְרַיִם בְּכֹרִי הוּא
ephraim-my-firstborn.english: For I am a father to Israel, and Ephraim is My firstborn
